meanings.definition: Having more physical strength or muscularity.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler's opponent was much brawnier than him.
meanings.sent2: The weightlifter became brawnier after months of training.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten thought it was brawnier than the big dog!
meanings.sent4: His determination made him brawnier than any obstacle in his way.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's brawnier muscles rippled as he lifted the car effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Showing more physical power or force.
meanings.sent1: The storm grew brawnier as the winds picked up speed.
meanings.sent2: The brawnier lion easily scared off the smaller animals.
meanings.sent3: The brawnier tree branches held strong against the strong wind.
meanings.sent4: His voice was brawnier than the rest, commanding attention in the room.
meanings.sent5: The brawnier waves crashed against the shore with a powerful roar.
